title: Android 14 gets official internal codename… Upside Down Cake
content:
Google has revealed the official codename for Android 14, internally dubbing the 2023 release “Upside Down Cake.”

more…

The post Android 14 gets official internal codename… Upside Down Cake appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google has unveiled the official internal codename for Android 14, dubbing the 2023 release "Upside Down Cake."
